meanings.definition: Not supervised or monitored by someone in authority.
meanings.sent1: The children played unsupervised in the park.
meanings.sent2: The experiment was left unsupervised for too long.
meanings.sent3: The unsupervised cupcakes disappeared mysteriously from the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The unsupervised garden grew wild and untamed.
meanings.sent5: The unsupervised student struggled to stay focused during class.

meanings.definition: Not under the direct supervision of someone in charge.
meanings.sent1: The unsupervised workers completed the task efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The unsupervised project turned out better than expected.
meanings.sent3: The unsupervised puppy caused chaos in the living room.
meanings.sent4: The unsupervised road led to unexpected adventures.
meanings.sent5: The unsupervised package arrived safely at its destination.
